name: 1 000 000 000 square meters of terrain
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD = drive car
move mouse = look around

You start at one edge of the terrain, so be sure to go the right way to get to see the whole landscape! Now, enjoy the ride!

I applied the terrain generation method from "The Forest" (https://grelf.itch.io/forest) to my game engine and it works magnificent. Fast, lightweight and NICE.
